city-night-house:
stack(
  s("bd*4").gain(1.1),
  s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.85),
  s("hh*8").gain(0.35),
  note("<f3 a3 c4 e4> <g3 b3 d4 f4>")
    .sound("triangle")
    .gain(0.18)
    .room(0.12)
    .lpf(2400)
).slow(1)
warm-rnb-loop:
stack(
  s("bd [~ bd] bd ~").gain(1.0),
  s("~ ~ sd ~").gain(0.7),
  s("hh*8").degradeBy(0.2).gain(0.28),
  note("[f3 a3 c4] [e3 g3 b3]")
    .sound("sawtooth")
    .gain(0.14)
    .room(0.18)
    .lpf(2000)
).slow(1.05)
ambient-dawn-with-beat:
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ bd").gain(0.8),
  s("~ ~ sd ~").gain(0.55),
  s("hh*8").gain(0.2),
  note("<f4 a4 c5 e5> [g4 b4 d5]")
    .sound("sine")
    .gain(0.12)
    .room(0.35)
    .lpf(sine.slow(24).range(700, 2300))
).slow(1.2)
ukgarage-punch:
stack(
  s("bd [~ bd] bd [~ bd]").gain(1.05),
  s("~ sd ~ [sd ~]").gain(0.82),
  s("hh*16").degradeBy(0.3).gain(0.26),
  note("[f3 c4 a3] [g3 d4 b3]")
    .sound("square")
    .gain(0.13)
    .lpf(1800)
).slow(1.0)
